```{r}
MS_translation_extraction_rob <- read_excel("MS_translation_extraction.xlsx", 
                                        sheet = "Interrater agreement+ Risk of B", 
                                        range = "b1:bh66") %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Author))
mined_rob <- read_excel("mined_rob_with_addpaper.xlsx")
```


```{r}
RoB_manual_clean<-
  MS_translation_extraction_rob%>%
  filter(!is.na(DOI)) %>% 
  mutate(DOI=gsub("[[:punct:]\\s]", "", DOI)) %>% 
  mutate(DOI=gsub(" ", "", DOI)) %>% 
  select(DOI,Randomization,Blinding,`ARRIVE guidelines`,`Animal welfare statement`,`Sample size calculation`,
        `Conflict of interest`)%>% 
  rename(ARRIVE=`ARRIVE guidelines`,
         Welfare=`Animal welfare statement`,
         Samplesize=`Sample size calculation`,
         Conflict=`Conflict of interest`) %>% 
  select(DOI,Randomization,Blinding,Welfare,Conflict,Samplesize,ARRIVE) %>% 
  setNames(paste0(names(.),"_manual")) %>% 
  rename(DOI=DOI_manual) %>% 
  mutate(across(ends_with("_manual"),~ gsub("2","0", .)))%>% 
  mutate(across(ends_with("_manual"),~ gsub("NA","0", .)))
```

```{r}
RoB_mined_clean<-
  mined_rob %>% 
  mutate(DOI=File.title) %>% 
  mutate(DOI=gsub(".*/", "", DOI)) %>% 
  mutate(DOI=gsub(".pdf", "", DOI)) %>% 
  mutate(DOI=gsub("[[:punct:]\\s]", "", DOI)) %>% 
  mutate(DOI=gsub(" ", "", DOI)) %>% 
  select(DOI,Randomization,Blinding,Welfare,Conflict,Samplesize,ARRIVE) %>% 
  setNames(paste0(names(.),"_mined")) %>% 
  rename(DOI=DOI_mined)%>% 
  mutate(across(ends_with("_mined"),~ gsub("not reported","0", .)))%>% 
  mutate(across(ends_with("_mined"),~ gsub("yes","1", .)))
```

```{r}
df_confmat<-data.frame()
RoB_items<-c("Randomization","Blinding","Welfare","Conflict","Samplesize","ARRIVE")

for(i in RoB_items){
df_template<-data.frame(cbind(result=c("TN","TP","FN","FP"),na=NA))

df_temp<-merge(RoB_manual_clean %>% select(DOI,paste0(i,"_manual")) %>% rename(manual=2),
RoB_mined_clean %>% select(DOI,paste0(i,"_mined"))%>% rename(mined=2),by="DOI") %>% 
  mutate(result=case_when(
    manual==1&mined==1~"TP",
    manual==1&mined==0~"FN",
    manual==0&mined==1~"FP",
    manual==0&mined==0~"TN",
  ))%>%
  group_by(result) %>% 
  count()%>%
  merge(.,df_template,by="result",all.y=T)  %>%
  select(!(na)) %>%
  replace_na(list(n=0)) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = result,values_from = n)

df<-data.frame(cbind(
  item=i,
  df_temp,
  sensitivity=df_temp$TP/(df_temp$TP+df_temp$FN),
  specificity=df_temp$TN/(df_temp$TN+df_temp$FP),
  precision=df_temp$TP/(df_temp$TP+df_temp$FP),
  F1=2*df_temp$TP/(2*df_temp$TP+df_temp$FP+df_temp$FN),
    accuracy=(df_temp$TP+df_temp$TN)/(df_temp$TP+df_temp$TN+df_temp$FP+df_temp$FN)))

  df_confmat<-rbind(df_confmat,df)

}

df_confmat %>% View()

```

```{r}
rob_figure<-RoB_mined_clean %>% 
  mutate(across(ends_with("_mined"),~ gsub("1","Low", .)))%>% 
  mutate(across(ends_with("_mined"),~ gsub("0","High", .))) %>% 
  rename(`ARRIVE guidelines`= ARRIVE_mined,
         `Animal welfare statement` = Welfare_mined,
         `Sample size calculation`=Samplesize_mined,
         `Conflict of interest`=Conflict_mined,
         Blinding=Blinding_mined,
         Randomization=Randomization_mined) %>% 
  pivot_longer(!DOI,names_to="item",values_to = "value") %>% 
  group_by(item,value) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  filter(!(item=="Conflict of interest")) %>% 
  ggplot() +
        geom_bar(stat="identity",
          aes(x=n,y = item,fill = value
          ),width = 0.7,position = "fill",color = "black"
        )+
  guides(fill = guide_legend(reverse = TRUE)) +
  scale_fill_manual("Risk of Bias",
          values = c(High = "#ff574e", Low = "#7bcd5b"),
          labels = c(High = "  High risk of bias  ",Low = "  Low risk of bias   "))+
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::percent)+
  theme(
          axis.title.x = ggplot2::element_blank(),
          axis.title.y = ggplot2::element_blank(),
          axis.ticks.y = ggplot2::element_blank(),
          axis.text.x=element_text(size=12),
          axis.text.y = ggplot2::element_text(size = 12,
                                              color = "black"),
          axis.line.x = ggplot2::element_line(
            colour = "black",
            size = 0.5,
            linetype = "solid"
          ),
          legend.position = "bottom",
          panel.grid.major = ggplot2::element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor = ggplot2::element_blank(),
          panel.background = ggplot2::element_blank(),
          legend.background = ggplot2::element_rect(linetype = "solid",
                                                    colour = "black"),
          legend.title = ggplot2::element_blank(),
          legend.key.size = ggplot2::unit(0.75, "cm"),
          legend.text = ggplot2::element_text(size = 10)
        )
```

SYRCLE coding
```{r}
library(readr)
HERMES_INCLUDED <- read_csv("HERMES_INCLUDED.csv")

syrcle_plot<-HERMES_INCLUDED %>% 
  filter(!(is.na(SYRCLE_allocation))) %>% 
  select(c(DOI,starts_with("SYRCLE"))) %>% 
  pivot_longer(!DOI) %>% 
  group_by(name,value) %>% count() %>% ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(n=n/50) %>% 
  mutate(value=factor(value,levels=c("low","unclear","high"))) %>% 
  mutate(name=case_when(
    name=="SYRCLE_allocation"~"Allocation",
name=="SYRCLE_allocationconcealment"~"Allocation concealment",
name=="SYRCLE_baselinegroups"~"Baseline groups",
name=="SYRCLE_blindingassessor"~"Blinding Assessor",
name=="SYRCLE_blindingcaregiver"~"Blinding Caregiver",
name=="SYRCLE_incompleteoutcome"~"Incomplete outcome",
name=="SYRCLE_other"~"Other",
name=="SYRCLE_randomassessment"~"Random Assessment",
name=="SYRCLE_randomhousing"~"Random Housing",
name=="SYRCLE_selectivereporting"~"Selective reporting"
  )) %>% 
ggplot() +
        geom_bar(stat="identity",
```

Sensitivity study = run the analysis /figures with only those studies that have Blinding/Randomization/both. Here: generating 3 dataframes to then select the same studies in HERMES_INCLUDED.csv
```{r}
df_both_randblind<-mined_rob %>% 
  filter(Blinding=="yes"&Randomization=="yes")%>% 
  mutate(File.title=gsub(".pdf", "", File.title)) %>% 
  mutate(File.title=gsub("Additional_papers/", "", File.title))  %>% 
  mutate(File.title=gsub("PDFs_included_studies/", "", File.title)) %>% 
  mutate(File.title=gsub("[[:punct:]\\s]", "", File.title)) %>% 
  rename(DOI=File.title)

df_blind<-mined_rob %>% 
  filter(Blinding=="yes"&Randomization!="yes")%>% 
  mutate(File.title=gsub(".pdf", "", File.title)) %>% 
  mutate(File.title=gsub("Additional_papers/", "", File.title))  %>% 
  mutate(File.title=gsub("PDFs_included_studies/", "", File.title)) %>% 
  mutate(File.title=gsub("[[:punct:]\\s]", "", File.title)) %>% 
  rename(DOI=File.title)

df_rand<-
  mined_rob %>% 
  filter(Randomization=="yes"&Blinding!="yes")%>% 
  mutate(File.title=gsub(".pdf", "", File.title)) %>% 
  mutate(File.title=gsub("Additional_papers/", "", File.title))  %>% 
  mutate(File.title=gsub("PDFs_included_studies/", "", File.title)) %>% 
  mutate(File.title=gsub("[[:punct:]\\s]", "", File.title)) %>% 
  rename(DOI=File.title)
    

HERMES_INCLUDED_rand<-
HERMES_INCLUDED%>%
  mutate(DOI=gsub(".pdf", "", DOI)) %>% 
  mutate(DOI=gsub("[[:punct:]\\s]", "", DOI)) %>% 
  mutate(DOI=gsub(" ", "", DOI)) %>% 
  merge(.,df_rand,by="DOI") %>% 
  mutate(subset_sensitivity="rand")

HERMES_INCLUDED_blind<-
HERMES_INCLUDED%>%
  mutate(DOI=gsub(".pdf", "", DOI)) %>% 
  mutate(DOI=gsub("[[:punct:]\\s]", "", DOI)) %>% 
  mutate(DOI=gsub(" ", "", DOI)) %>% 
  merge(.,df_blind,by="DOI")%>% 
  mutate(subset_sensitivity="blind")

HERMES_INCLUDED_both_randblind<-
HERMES_INCLUDED%>%
  mutate(DOI=gsub(".pdf", "", DOI)) %>% 
  mutate(DOI=gsub("[[:punct:]\\s]", "", DOI)) %>% 
  mutate(DOI=gsub(" ", "", DOI)) %>% 
  merge(.,df_both_randblind,by="DOI")%>% 
  mutate(subset_sensitivity="both")


data_sensitivity_analysis_HERMES_INCLUDED<-rbind(HERMES_INCLUDED_rand,HERMES_INCLUDED_blind,HERMES_INCLUDED_both_randblind) %>% 
  select(subset_sensitivity,everything())

write.csv(data_sensitivity_analysis_HERMES_INCLUDED,"HERMES_INCLUDED_sensitivity.csv")


```
